lines.text: Slavery in the colonies or the gallows here? Speak up, girl! Which is it to be?
You can't burn my place! It took me two years to build that store!
It'll take you all eternity to grow a new scalp.
The King's Law moves with the king's muskets, and there are very few King's muskets west of the alleghenies.
I don't know what the Good Lord was about when he made a female out of a perfectly good rib.
